mapper.sql: PERSON_ID, NAME, SEX, DISTRICT_ID, INCLUDE_LOWER, ORG_ID, LAW_TYPE, LICENCE_CODE, LICENCE_ORG, LICENCE_TIME, LICENCE_EXPIRE, PHONE, POST, STATUS, CREATEUSERID, CREATETIME, ATTACHMENT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from LAW_PERSON
order by ${orderByClause}

select (select org.org_name from organise org where org.org_code=org_id) orgName,
from LAW_PERSON where PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into LAW_PERSON (PERSON_ID, NAME, SEX, DISTRICT_ID, INCLUDE_LOWER, ORG_ID, LAW_TYPE, LICENCE_CODE, LICENCE_ORG, LICENCE_TIME, LICENCE_EXPIRE, PHONE, POST, STATUS, CREATEUSERID, CREATETIME, ATTACHMENT) values (#{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{includeLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{licenceExpire,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ATTACHMENT,

mapper.update:
update LAW_PERSON
PERSON_ID = #{record.personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_ID = #{record.districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCLUDE_LOWER = #{record.includeLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAW_TYPE = #{record.lawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE_CODE = #{record.licenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE_ORG = #{record.licenceOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE_TIME = #{record.licenceTime,jdbcType=DATE},
LICENCE_EXPIRE = #{record.licenceExpire,jdbcType=DATE},
PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST = #{record.post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEUSERID = #{record.createuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
ATTACHMENT = #{record.attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update LAW_PERSON set PERSON_ID = #{record.personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_ID = #{record.districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCLUDE_LOWER = #{record.includeLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAW_TYPE = #{record.lawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_CODE = #{record.licenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_ORG = #{record.licenceOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_TIME = #{record.licenceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LICENCE_EXPIRE = #{record.licenceExpire,jdbcType=DATE}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST = #{record.post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEUSERID = #{record.createuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, ATTACHMENT = #{record.attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LAW_PERSON
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCLUDE_LOWER = #{includeLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAW_TYPE = #{lawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE_CODE = #{licenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE_ORG = #{licenceOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE_TIME = #{licenceTime,jdbcType=DATE},
LICENCE_EXPIRE = #{licenceExpire,jdbcType=DATE},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEUSERID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
ATTACHMENT = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update LAW_PERSON set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCLUDE_LOWER = #{includeLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAW_TYPE = #{lawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_CODE = #{licenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_ORG = #{licenceOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_TIME = #{licenceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LICENCE_EXPIRE = #{licenceExpire,jdbcType=DATE}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEUSERID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, ATTACHMENT = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.sql: L.PERSON_ID, L.NAME, L.SEX, L.DISTRICT_ID, L.INCLUDE_LOWER, L.ORG_ID, L.LAW_TYPE, L.LICENCE_CODE, L.LICENCE_ORG, L.LICENCE_TIME, L.LICENCE_EXPIRE, L.PHONE, L.POST, L.STATUS, L.CREATEUSERID, L.CREATETIME, L.ATTACHMENT
mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_ U WHERE U.USER_ID=L.CREATEUSERID) as userName, O.ORG_NAME AS orgName,
FROM LAW_PERSON L LEFT JOIN ORGANISE O ON L.ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND L.NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
AND L.ORG_Id =#{orgId}
AND L.LICENCE_ORG LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{licenceOrg}),'%')
AND L.DISTRICT_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{districtId}),'%')
AND L.CREATEUSERID = #{createuserid}
ORDER BY L.PERSON_ID DESC, L.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT U.USER_NAME as userName, O.ORG_NAME AS orgName,
FROM LAW_PERSON L,USER_ U ,ORGANISE O WHERE L.CREATEUSERID=U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID=O.ORG_CODE
AND o.district_code like #{districtId} ||'%'
AND L.CREATETIME >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM')
AND L.CREATETIME < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM') + interval '1' month
ORDER BY L.PERSON_ID DESC, L.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAW_PERSON L,USER_ U ,ORGANISE O WHERE L.CREATEUSERID=U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID=O.ORG_CODE
AND o.district_code like #{districtId} ||'%'
AND L.CREATETIME >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM')
AND L.CREATETIME < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM') + interval '1' month
